ctx: intros A x v dom m H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable m.

original: intros A x v dom m H. assert (Dom.In x dom) as Hin. apply find_dom with (v := v). auto. assert (eq (t:=eq (add A dom x v m))) by reflexivity. apply eq_sym. apply eq_trans with (m₂ := add A (Dom.add x dom) x v m). - apply add_compat. + reflexivity. + apply eq_trans with (m₂ := m). * apply eq_sym. apply eq_sym. * auto. - apply eq_sym. apply add_None. split. + intro. apply (find_None _ _ _ m) in H0. rewrite H0 in H. inversion H. + apply find_None. intro. apply (add_Some _ _ _ _ v). eapply find_Some. eauto.
